boards.role: Read temperature and humidity from DHT11 sensor and transmit data via RF transmitter to indoor display
warnings: ⚡ BREADBOARD REQUIRED: 3 components need 5V power but Arduino Uno only has 1 physical 5V pin. Route one wire from Arduino 5V → breadboard + rail, then connect all component VCC lines to the breadboard.
🥪 BREADBOARD AUTO-INJECTED: Pin deficit detected (5V/GND). Moving power distribution to breadboard rails.
⚡ LOGIC LEVEL CONVERTER READY: Will auto-inject post-solve to bridge 3.3V components (WiFi/RFID) with 5V Arduino.
⚡ SHIFTER INJECTED: 3.3V Silicon detected. Dropped 4-Channel Bi-Directional Logic Level Converter to prevent 5V blowout.
